\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {V_1} & {V_2} & {?} \\
	{\,} & \bullet & \bullet & {?} & {\,} \\
	& \bullet & \bullet
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\mathsf{Cof}}", from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\mathsf{TFib}}"', from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\mathsf{TFib}}", from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
